changelog.zh:
- 新增：手机端横屏/竖屏启动模式设置
- 新增：手机端横屏模式完整适配，支持横屏浏览频道列表
- 新增：手机端横屏模式下自动调整卡片布局和尺寸
- 优化：手机端横屏模式下的 UI 布局和交互体验
- 优化：设置页面新增屏幕方向配置选项
- 修复：手机端横屏模式下部分界面显示异常的问题
changelog.en:
- Added: Mobile landscape/portrait startup mode setting
- Added: Full landscape mode support for mobile, browse channels in landscape
- Added: Auto-adjust card layout and size in landscape mode
- Improved: UI layout and interaction in mobile landscape mode
- Improved: Screen orientation configuration in settings
- Fixed: Some UI display issues in mobile landscape mode
